original_text: No one devoted, who is to be devoted for destruction from mankind, shall be ransomed; he shall surely be put to death.
korean_text: 온전히 바쳐진 그 사람은 다시 무르지 못하나니 반드시 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: who is to be devoted for destruction from mankind
sentences.korean_translation: 사람 중에서 진멸을 위해 바쳐진 자는

sentences.original_text: he shall surely be put to death
